preqs: Students must have passed one of the following units: ETC2420, ETC2520 or MTH2222 before undertaking this unit

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {3816} Do Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50} Otherwise true
For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {3816} Do Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50} Otherwise true

Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETC2420, ETC2520, MTH2222} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {3816} Do Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50} Otherwise true
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETC2520, MTH2222} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: To provide a grounding in the mathematics and statistics of short term insurance risk.
